Text: Fantastic choice, again. So much variety in your uploads! I read this when I was very young and it made a big impression on me. I don't suppose you have 'Futuretrack 5' anywhere? It is another novel by Westall. I have searched for it in the past, but have never found it in any form.

Sorry, I don't have it, but I'll keep an eye out for it. Sometimes I'm very lucky when I keep an eye out.

;-)

Very lucky! :-)

Another that you may find, one day, but asking more out of curiosity than anything else: 'Worldmakers', a short story collection edited by Gardner Dozois.
